item.title: Get notification details
item.description: GET request that will return detailed information about a specific notification, identified by its notificationId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Get payment status
item.description: GET request that will return the payment status for a specific order, identified by its orderId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Get user notifications
item.description: GET request that will return a list of notifications for a specific user, with options to filter by status (unread or all).
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: List inventory list
item.description: GET request that will return inventory list
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Get inventory status
item.description: GET request that will return the current stock status for a specific product.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Get subscription status
item.description: GET request that will return the current subscription status for a specific user, identified by their userId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Get order details
item.description: GET request that will return detailed information about a specific order, identified by its orderId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Get subscription status
item.description: GET request that will return the current subscription status for a specific user, identified by their userId.
item.author: Postgardner
